exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: The killer that no one likes.

exercises.name: Push Ups
exercises.description: Get down on the floor, use arms, push up.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Step your left leg out, pull your left leg in, alternate legs, repeat.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Act like your pooping without the toilet.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description: Get a rope, jump over it, rinse and repeat.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: On all fours, now run in place.

exercises.name: Mummy Kicks
exercises.description: Wrap yourself in toilet paper if you have any, put your arms out, and shuffle kick.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Remember just like grade school gym class.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Run in place, but knees up...HIGH.

exercises.name: Butt Kicks
exercises.description: Run in place, but kick yourself in the rear.

exercises.name: Planks
exercises.description: On the floor, supported by your forearms, now act like a board.

exercises.name: Pull Ups
exercises.description: Just think about pulling the bar down!

exercises.name: Ab Roller
exercises.description: This requires reading the instructions of your ab roller.

exercises.name: Wipers
exercises.description: On back, legs up, wipe the air (wax on, wax off).

exercises.name: Bicycle Kicks
exercises.description: Ride that pretend Peleton  bike on your back.
